modName: Assassin's Creed Rogue inspired Air Rifle
summary: Adds Air Rifle, Sleep dart, Bezerk Dart and normal dart all craftable under imperial category in smithing requires steel smithing perk
descriptionHtml:
i am no good with descriptions but here is my attempt
this mod [h1] Requires Dawnguard DLC [/h1] and this mod adds an air rifle, sleep darts, bezerk darts and a normal dart, all of them are silent :) like in Rogue.
Sleep darts use paralysis while bezerk darts uses fury

They are all Craftable under the Imperial smithing catagory at any forge same with the darts and require steel smithing perk
Air rifle also does 2 damage and the darts do 5 and normal dart 10, i put them low so the darts can actually do their effects instead of killing your target b4 doing its effects
[u] I do not have the IDs of them yet  but i will soon [/u]
Air rifle requirements:
1 dwarven ingot, 3 firewood and 3 steel ingots
Sleep dart:
1 steel ingot and 1 firewood
Bezerk Dart:
1 steel ingot and 1 firewood
Normal Dart:
1 steel ingot and 1 firewood

also on steam [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=371880070]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=371880070[/url]


#NOTE

there is a bug with the darts how they do not do their suppose to be effects will be fixed in future
there will be a bezerk poison and sleep poison  they will be just tempererily
author: Altair Ibn la Ahad
